Title: Episode 12
Plot: With the railway now in Inglestone news comes through that the post office there is to become the main sorting office for the area. Mr Blakestone, the postmaster there does not get on with Dorcas and she is worried about the future. Daniel learns from Fisher that he is going to try and win Laura back.
